ProductInfo.Features:
GW9408H: 8 Channel H.264 video compression format; support 960H & D1 resolution; 960H/D1/HD1/CIF Playback quality; HDMI output for better resolution
GW623C: 1/3" CMOS Outdoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. Low Illumination 0.1 Lux. Metal vandal proof & water proof
GW531H: 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 650 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes:GW9408H DVR w/ 2T HDD; 4xGW623C-1/3" CMOS CCD Camera; GWLED19IN-Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 4xGW531H-1/3" SONY CCD Camera; 1xGW125CAW:125 feet pre-made cable BNC;
Package Includes: 2xGW100CAW:100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 4xGW60CAW:60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1xGW25CAW:25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1x12V5A:Power Supply for Security Cameras; 1xGW128CA:1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
